titleStmt.title: To the most irreuerend Pope-holy Fathers of the two seminaries at Rheimes and Rome A confirmation of the xposition of the former emblemes, containing a messe of spirituall sonnets, or two paire of pastorall Eclogues, in rurall meeter: for the Kings crowne and dignitie, against the Popes miter and rochet.
titleStmt.author: G. W. P. S.

titleStmt.title: To the most irreuerend Pope-holy Fathers of the two seminaries at Rheimes and Rome A confirmation of the xposition of the former emblemes, containing a messe of spirituall sonnets, or two paire of pastorall Eclogues, in rurall meeter: for the Kings crowne and dignitie, against the Popes miter and rochet.
titleStmt.author: G. W. P. S.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: By G. W. P. S. one of the meanest ministers of the Gospel in England.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
